participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and nostalgic, Jessica enjoys reminiscing about her childhood and has a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80s. i also like old school hip hop.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Mark enjoys sharing stories and is passionate about his work.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.

content.text: I guess there is a problem
